channel.title: Planar Magnetic Drivers on Top Secret Labs - Richard Sumilang
channel.description: Recent content in Planar Magnetic Drivers on Top Secret Labs - Richard Sumilang

item.title: What are Planar Magnetic Drivers?
item.description: A Planar Magnetic driver, has coined a few other terms such as “orthodynamic” or “Isodynamic”, all of which mean the same thing (in regards to headphones). They can be described as the child of a dynamic and electrostatic driver, sort of… The best of both worlds, at least.
